Notable Projects Face Detection and Recognition in Python A customizable face detection and recognition model which can recognize faces once the model has run over known faces. The model uses a Convolutional Neural Network to identify faces. The know images with their names have to be placed in the folder. Image Denoising and Smoothing in CUDA This program is written in CUDA and C++, and can smoothen any input figure using the Mean filter. For preprocessing the data, the image is first convolved with a Sobel filter, then a sharpening filter and finally finished with a mean filter. This project is set up on localhost but with suitable modifications, can be broadcasted in the Internet. A 3D cube simulator which is written in C# and made in Unity 3D.
